snippet: The U.S.S.F. president Sunil Gulati said he hopes to have a coach for the women’s national team in place in the next three to six weeks, and that the federation was working on multiple fronts to facilitate the launch of another Division 1 women’s...
abstract: The U.S.S.F. president Sunil Gulati said he hopes to have a coach for the women’s national team in place in the next three to six weeks, and that the federation was working on multiple fronts to facilitate the launch of another Division 1 women’s league.

headline.main: Leader of U.S. Soccer Discusses Women's Coaching Position, and a New League
